meanings.definition: The world or community of films and filmmaking.
meanings.sent1: In filmdom, directors work hard to bring stories to life on the big screen.
meanings.sent2: Many actors dream of becoming famous in filmdom.
meanings.sent3: The award ceremony in filmdom was filled with laughter and excitement.
meanings.sent4: Her passion for filmdom was like a burning flame that never flickered.
meanings.sent5: Exploring the depths of filmdom can lead to discovering hidden gems.

meanings.definition: The characteristics or qualities associated with films or the film industry.
meanings.sent1: The glamour and glitz of filmdom can be captivating.
meanings.sent2: Critics often analyze the trends in filmdom to predict future successes.
meanings.sent3: She added a touch of filmdom to her wardrobe by wearing sunglasses indoors.
meanings.sent4: The magic of filmdom can transport you to different worlds without leaving your seat.
meanings.sent5: His knowledge of filmdom trivia was unmatched among his friends.
